title: Almeida (Vasco de)
body: He was born in Funchal. Ref.: Arte de criar os bichos de seda... translation from French and Italian, Funchal, 1870, 61 pages.

Vasco de Almeida: Author of the work 'Arte de criar os bichos de seda...'

1870: Publication of the work 'Arte de criar os bichos de seda...' by Vasco de Almeida
